reviewtext: I would have given this 0 stars but that didn't appear to be an option on the Amazon.com form.  After seeking through the entire SW band three different times, at different times of the day and night, all I got was  BBC, and that only once, and some religious broadcasts.  I would have been  very happy to get stations from just Canada and Mexico, but no such luck.  It's a very nice AM/FM radio with some spiffy features like a sleep timer,  but my hope was to receive international broadcasts, and I am returning it  because it simply did not do that.
